translation.en: Yo, just give me some space. You'll all get a chance to see it.
translation.ko: 좀 비켜봐 너희들 다 볼 시간 줄게

translation.en: Anyone who wants in on this election thing
needs to sign up by 5:00 the day of the debate.
Does Harry know you put his name down?
translation.ko: 네가 이름 적은 거 해리가 알아?

translation.en: 'Cause last time I saw him, he could barely get out of bed.
translation.ko: 내가 마지막으로 봤을 때는 누워만 있던데

translation.en: Five miles, and I barely broke a sweat.
Oh, and I signed us up for the election.
Yeah, there was some dumb sign-up sheet at the church,
What do you mean, you signed us up?
Did you drink a bunch of beer before your run, too?
What, you think Allie's doing a bad job?
it's not like we made her little miss queen forever.
translation.ko: 언제까지나 여왕 놀이 시중만 들 수는 없잖아

translation.en: Well, everyone knows she's going to win. All right?
Just let her worry about making the decisions.
Plus, nobody gives a shit about what we think.
translation.ko: 게다가 누가 우리 생각에 관심이나 있냐?

translation.en: We do all the dirty work.
We should at least get a say in how this place is run.
translation.ko: 최소한 여기 돌아가는 판국에 대해 발언권은 가져야지

translation.en: This is our chance to be more than just the muscle.
translation.ko: 그냥 어깨가 아니란 걸 증명할 기회야

translation.en: Don't you want to know how that feels?
It's just a guess, but if fits the most symptoms:
Apparently, it has a sweetness to it, so you wouldn't be able to taste it.
translation.ko: 거기서 단맛이 나서 눈치 못 챘을 거야

translation.en: it's in people's garages, anyone can have access.
translation.ko: 차고에도 다 있으니 누구나 쓸 수 있어

translation.en: So, I've got to stand up
at the debate in three days,
and promise to keep people safe.
Except for the fact that I have no fucking idea who tried to poison us.
translation.ko: 독살을 시도한 게 누구인지는 모르는 채로

translation.en: I wouldn't use those exact words.
translation.ko: 나라면 그 워딩 안 쓸 거야

translation.en: Can we try to make a list of the people who have it in their houses?
translation.ko: 어느 집에 부동액이 있는지 목록이라도 만들 순 있지?

translation.en: Well, we could do that, but just to be real, we're probably never gonna find this person.
translation.ko: 할 수는 있지만 범인을 찾는 건 현실적으로 불가능할 거야

translation.en: It's probably not the best use of resources.
for a second, pretend I know what I'm doing?
translation.ko: 내 판단이 옳다고 해주면 안 돼?

translation.en: There's a lot going on with the election and...
I didn't know what it was.
What was I supposed to do?
I don't know. I felt a lot of things.
-Yeah, I get that and I should've-- -What about Kelly?
translation.ko: - 그래, 그래서 내가... - 켈리는 어떻게 됐어?

translation.en: You're just done with her and you're onto me?
translation.ko: 그래서 걔랑 끝나고 나한테 돌아선 거야?

translation.en: I thought I knew how I felt about her and what I wanted.
translation.ko: 켈리에 대한 내 감정과 바람이 확실한 줄 알았어

translation.en: something might happen to you, and...
think I could feel that way about anyone.
Look, I can't stop thinking about you.
So that's what that was last night.
What, so now we're in some universe where you're generous and thoughtful?
translation.ko: 이번 평행 우주에선 너그럽고 사려 깊은 캐릭터야?

translation.en: Drink up. We gotta get you ready for the debate.
I signed you up this morning.
You're gonna run for mayor against Allie.
We don't have a lot of time if we're going to pull this off,
so let's just skip this part.
You look like shit, by the way.
I'm not being pulled into this bullshit.
If you want to be in charge so bad, you run.
translation.ko: 그렇게 권력을 잡고 싶으면 네가 출마해

translation.en: I'd never get elected. You know that.
You like the way things are?
Being crammed into a house with a bunch of fucking assholes?
translation.ko: 등신 같은 놈들이 꾸역꾸역 몰려와 사는 게?

translation.en: You want this to be your life?
Then get your shit together, man. This is our chance.
translation.ko: 그럼 정신 차려야지 우리에게 기회가 왔어

translation.en: I remember when you used to run this place.
translation.ko: 난 이 바닥을 꽉 잡던 너를 기억해

translation.en: That guy is still in there.
Let's get you back where you belong.
It's been kind of quiet in here since everyone got sick.
translation.ko: 다들 한바탕 아픈 후로는 교회가 한산했어

translation.en: I still think it's nice to pray with someone.
translation.ko: 그래도 기도할 때 옆에 누군가 있다니 좋네

translation.en: Even if we're praying for different things.
-Are you sure? -Yeah, it's no big deal. It's fine.
Elle, you're bleeding. Let me see.
Did you want him to give it to you?
-Everything is clearly not fine. -No, he's just a little...
translation.ko: - 문제가 있는 게 분명해 - 아니, 캠벨이 그냥 좀...

translation.en: He just manhandles me a little sometimes, you know?
It's... It's okay. You can tell me.
If... If he finds out, it'll only make things worse.
Everything you say stays between us, I swear.
I never know when it's going to happen.
I'll say that I'm going for a walk or that I'm going to bed.
translation.ko: 산책하러 간다거나 자러 간다고 말했을 뿐인데도

translation.en: You know, I used to just...
I used to think it was just kinky stuff, you know?
Like, he was just playful, but...
He likes to see me in pain.
translation.ko: 내가 고통받는 걸 보고 싶어 해

translation.en: He likes to see me scared. [sobs]
translation.ko: 내가 겁내는 걸 보고 싶어 해

translation.en: [cries] Helena, I am. I'm really scared.
I just... I feel like his hands are around my throat,
translation.ko: 캠벨이 두 손으로 내 목을 쥐고 있는데

translation.en: and I'm just waiting for him to squeeze too tight.
Look, I know you don't want to tell anyone, but...
No, I don't want to talk to Allie.
And I've done terrible things, too.
Elle, I'm not letting you go back to someone who's abusing you.
translation.ko: 너를 학대하는 사람에게 돌려보낼 수 없어

translation.en: I can't, Helena. He'll find me.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 헬레나 캠벨이 찾아낼 거야

translation.en: you can't bring your Nintendo into the woods.
Come on, man. It weighs, like, nothing.
-[Allie] How's it going? -Good. Just a few adjustments.
translation.ko: - 준비 잘 돼? - 좋아 몇 가지만 정리하면 돼

translation.en: Have you decided which way you're gonna go?
Yeah. First, we're gonna head east past where the turnpike used to be.
translation.ko: 우선 고속도로가 있던 곳을 지나 동쪽으로 갈 거야

translation.en: Um, maybe it's flat enough we can start shuttling food back and forth.
translation.ko: 그쪽 지형이 완만하면 식량을 옮길 수 있어

translation.en: After that, I'm just looking for open land, good light, and a water source.
translation.ko: 그다음에는 볕이 잘 들고 물이 있는 개활지를 찾아야지

translation.en: -How long do you think you'll be gone? -Hopefully, just a week,
translation.ko: 며칠이나 걸릴까? 일주일이 딱 좋지만 만약에 대비해 2주일분 챙겼어

translation.en: but we packed for two, just in case.
translation.ko: 일주일이 딱 좋지만 만약에 대비해 2주일분 챙겼어

translation.en: But this time's gonna be different. You're gonna be more careful.
translation.ko: 하지만 이번엔 다를 거야 너도 더 조심할 거잖아

translation.en: We can't think like that right now.
translation.ko: 지금은 그런 식으로 생각해선 안 돼

translation.en: You're gonna find what you're looking for.
-I know, and I want to be hopeful. -Well, you don't look hopeful.
translation.ko: - 나도 긍정적으로 생각하고 싶어 - 그렇게 안 보여

translation.en: Well, you haven't seen what I've seen.
translation.ko: 넌 내가 본 걸 못 봤으니까

translation.en: Campbell keeps texting me, asking me where I am.
translation.ko: 캠벨이 어디 있느냐고 계속 문자를 보내

translation.en: Elle, there are too many of us.
He can't come barging in here.
I guess it's weird that we never really knew each other in high school.
translation.ko: 고등학교 때 우리가 모르고 지냈다는 게 희한해

translation.en: The only thing that I do remember
is in the hallway of junior year.
I heard you call me a thot.
And it bugged me for weeks, you know?
Why would the most popular girl in high school
translation.ko: 어째서 학교에서 가장 인기 있는 여자애가

translation.en: turn to her quarterback boyfriend and say,
I asked my cousin, and she clarified.
It's a really shitty thing to say.
I guess it's just weird how much things have changed.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 상황이 이렇게 달라질 수 있을까

translation.en: Hey, I think you have something that belongs to me.
translation.ko: 내 물건이 여기 있는 거 같은데

translation.en: Look, I'm the wrong person to fuck with.
Bacon, egg, and cheese still your favorite?
checking in on me and everything.
And show up for me like that.
You should probably get some better friends.
what's the deal with Campbell signing you up for the debate?
translation.ko: 왜 캠벨이 네 이름을 토론회 명단에 올렸어?

translation.en: And is that your idea or Campbell's?
We both think that things need to change around--
translation.ko: 여기가 달라져야 한다는 게 우리 둘의 생각이야

translation.en: Did you make a deal with him? What did he offer you in exchange?
translation.ko: 무슨 거래 했어? 출마한 대가로 뭘 주겠대?

translation.en: I just want to get my life, like, back.
Right, but you're prepared to make a deal with the devil to do that.
translation.ko: 그러자고 악마와도 거래할 준비가 된 거야?
- 걘 내 손 안에 있어 - 정말?

translation.en: You're an idiot if you think you can put Campbell in charge of your life.
translation.ko: 캠벨한테 인생을 맡기기로 했다면 넌 바보야

translation.en: -It's happening. -Then you better watch your back.
Because the only person Campbell gives a shit about is Campbell.
translation.ko: 캠벨이 챙기는 건 오직 캠벨 자신뿐이니까

translation.en: Hey, cuddle bug. You seen my thermal underwear?
translation.ko: 안녕, 자기야 내 발열 내의 봤어?

translation.en: I told Grizz I'd let him borrow 'em for the trip.
translation.ko: 그리즈 원정 여행 갈 때 빌려준다고 했거든

translation.en: This may come as a surprise to you,
but I don't keep constant track of your undergarments.
translation.ko: 난 네 속옷 관리하는 사람이 아냐

translation.en: Unless it's weird to share something that gets, you know, intimate with your junk?
translation.ko: 은밀한 부위가 닿는 부분을 빌려주는 건 이상한가?

translation.en: Babe, I'm a little busy. I'm trying to find Elle some extra clothes.
translation.ko: 자기야, 나 좀 바빠 엘이 입을 옷을 찾아야 해

translation.en: You're so hot when you're doing the right thing.
translation.ko: 넌 옳은 일을 할 때가 진짜 섹시해

translation.en: Hey, um, if you have time later,
do you think you can work your magic on a little speech for me?
translation.ko: 네 마법 같은 실력으로 발표문 검토해줄래?

translation.en: How'd you like to be first lady of New Ham?
translation.ko: 뉴 햄의 퍼스트레이디가 되고 싶지 않아?

translation.en: Well... [clear throat] I'm running for mayor.
What made you decide to do that?
I don't know. I thought it was, you know, finally time to step up.
translation.ko: 이제 내가 나설 때가 왔다는 생각이 들었어

translation.en: Allie's doing pretty good at this.
Yeah, I mean, I just think I can do better.
translation.ko: 근데 내가 더 잘할 거 같거든

translation.en: She's got a really good head for this stuff.
babe, I'm just not sure you've really thought this through.
translation.ko: 깊이 생각하고 결정한 건지 잘 모르겠어

translation.en: You don't want me to run.
Things are fine the way they are.
-Why are you risking this now? -So now I'm a fucking risk?
translation.ko: - 왜 이 시점에 위험한 짓을 해? - 내가 그렇게 불안해?

translation.en: You were the one that told me that I should take on more responsibility,
translation.ko: 더 비중 있는 일을 맡으라고 한 게 너잖아

translation.en: -I didn't mean right now. -Because you don't think I can do it.
translation.ko: - 당장은 아니지 - 내가 못 할 거 같아서 그래?

translation.en: But you're already so good at what you do with the Guard.
translation.ko: 하지만 가드 일도 너무나 멋지게 해내고 있어

translation.en: Maybe that's good enough for now.
Well, maybe good enough isn't good enough anymore.
translation.ko: 그 정도로 충분하다는 걸로는 양에 안 차는 것 같은데

translation.en: Where? Thanks for the fucking support.
Never thought of you as religious.
Just wanted to make sure we had some space.
I don't think it's such a good idea.
I have a lot of responsibilities.
-I have a lot that I have to focus on. -You think I don't know that?
translation.ko: - 집중해야 할 일이 많아 - 내가 그걸 모를까?

translation.en: Getting through the winter, figuring out how to feed people.
translation.ko: 겨울을 나야 하고 식량 수급을 생각해야 해

translation.en: There's a lot of big decisions that I have to make.
Okay, so we'll make them together.
translation.ko: 알았어, 우리 둘이 같이 결정하면 되잖아

translation.en: I don't want people to think that we're making them together.
translation.ko: 남들이 우리 둘의 결정이라고 생각하는 게 싫어

translation.en: I don't want you to think we're making them together.
translation.ko: 네가 우리 둘이 결정한다고 생각하는 것도 싫어

translation.en: And I have to make them, alone.
That's not a good enough reason.
between what you think is the best decision,
and that's what I'd want, to make you happy,
and what the best decision is for the town,
translation.ko: 반면에 마을을 위한 최선의 결정도 있어

translation.en: Well, I wouldn't put you in that position.
But I know myself well enough to know that I would lose myself in you, and...
translation.ko: 근데 나라는 애는 너한테 눈이 멀어버릴 거야

translation.en: I've wanted this for such a long time.
Just because you decided to show up doesn't mean it's a good time for me.
translation.ko: 하지만 네가 나타난 이 순간이 내게도 최선일 수는 없어

translation.en: It isn't about what you want,
And I don't trust myself to be with you the way I want to be with you
translation.ko: 내가 너와 사귀면서 마을을 최우선으로 삼으리란 확신이 없어

translation.en: We'll just have to figure the rest of it out.
I'm not the same person... that I was.
translation.ko: 난 예전의 앨리와 같은 사람이 아니야

translation.en: I just thought I heard something.
we checked everybody's garage and made a list of who's got antifreeze.
translation.ko: 모든 집의 차고를 수색해 부동액 소유자 명단을 만들었어

translation.en: Which is kind of dumb because whoever did it could've thrown it out.
translation.ko: 한심한 짓이지 범인은 이미 버렸을 테니까

translation.en: Well, did you check the dump?
Okay, I'm gonna let you guys figure that one out.
There's something else I need to talk to you about.
I saw your names on the list for mayor and council,
translation.ko: 시장과 시의원 후보 명단에서 너희 이름을 봤어

translation.en: and I know this isn't really what you want to hear right now,
translation.ko: 시장과 시의원 후보 명단에서 너희 이름을 봤어 지금 이런 소리를 듣는 건 정말 싫겠지만

translation.en: Look, you guys are like the military around here.
Okay? The military can't run for office.
translation.ko: 군인이 공직 선거에 출마할 순 없지

translation.en: That would just screw things up.
You can't make the rules and then enforce them. Okay?
translation.ko: 법을 만드는 사람이 직접 집행할 수는 없어

translation.en: This whole governing ourselves thing, it doesn't work if you do it that way.
translation.ko: 우리끼리 세운 자치 정부는 그런 식으로 운영되지 않아

translation.en: You can't be on Greg Dewey's jury and then execute him.
translation.ko: 그레그 듀이의 배심원이었다가 처형할 순 없지

translation.en: After all the shit we did for you?
All the shit you made us do?
I get it, it's not what you want, but you guys need to think about the town.
translation.ko: 달갑지 않다는 건 알지만 마을을 생각해야지

translation.en: No, you can't just shut us out.
If we're going to survive, we need you.
To keep holding the line, to keep the peace.
Who the fuck are you to decide what I'm good at?
translation.ko: 네가 뭔데 무슨 일이 나한테 맞는지 결정해?

translation.en: [Elle] It's not safe for either of us if I stay.
translation.ko: 내가 여기 있으면 우리 둘 다 위험해

translation.en: I have to figure this out of my own.
Not as complicated as getting this baby out's gonna be.
translation.ko: 아기 받는 것만큼 복잡하진 않을 거야

translation.en: Well, the poisoning was crazy, and we handled it.
translation.ko: 독극물 때도 난리였지만 우리 잘 해냈잖아

translation.en: Yeah, but between Becca and the baby...
I mean, people go to medical school for this for like 15 years.
translation.ko: 그런 거 배우러 의대에 15년씩 다니는 거잖아

translation.en: Okay, but who's gonna teach us?
Maybe we can teach each other.
Meet a couple times a week,
get all the medical textbooks and, I don't know, we'll figure it out.
translation.ko: 의학 교재 다 가져다가 같이 연구하는 거지

translation.en: So you want to be my partner?
Do you want me to have a stroke?
You've got one job to do.
Lie here until that baby is fully cooked.
translation.ko: 아기가 다 자랄 때까지 가만히 누워 있어

translation.en: I'm ready for this part to be over.
I just feel like a really sophisticated...
septic system for some alien life form.
I'm having some very real FOMO right now.
You're going to be the mother
of the first baby born in this town.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 아기의 엄마가 될 거야

translation.en: Nobody else gets to do that.
And I'm going to be right here
'Cause you can still back out right now if you want.
I'm giving you a free pass.
No, I want to do this.
I'm in. All the way, okay?
I heard you were taking off soon.
Saw they're planning a big send-off thing.
You have everything for the trip?
-Really is getting colder-- -Listen, do you need something, Sam?
translation.ko: 날씨가 추워지니까... 뭐 필요한 거 있어, 샘?

translation.en: These are the rules for the debate.
'Cause the last time I saw you--
Sometimes I wonder if there's another version of this world where we're friends.
translation.ko: 우리가 친구인 다른 세계가 있지 않을까 궁금할 때가 있어

translation.en: Where we want the same thing for people,
look out for each other, you know?
We don't agree on some stuff.
translation.ko: 우리가 서로 동의하지 않는 부분이 있어

translation.en: It seems like the right thing to do.
Let me know if you work it out.
It seems like a nice place.
Yeah, fuck this. It's fucking wrong.
[Clark] Who the fuck does she think she is?
Like we're her servants just doing her bidding.
Yeah, we're like... We're like pieces of meat.

translation.ko: 우리도 머리 잘 쓸 수 있어

translation.en: -You know what I think? -What are you thinking?
I'm thinking you guys are being fucking idiots.
You guys can't go pulling this kind of shit right now.
translation.ko: 지금은 너희가 이런 짓을 벌일 때가 아니야

translation.en: Suddenly, you're leading this fucking expedition or whatever,
translation.ko: 갑자기 그 원정대인지 뭔지 대가리에 앉게 되니

translation.en: and now you think you're better than us?
I'm just trying to do my job.
I don't know what happens if we don't.
translation.ko: 그러지 않으면 무슨 일이 날지 몰라

translation.en: Grizzy, come on, buddy. Don't go to bed angry.
translation.ko: 가지 마 화내면서 자러 가면 안 되지

translation.en: Are you going on a trip?
I know you've been trying to figure out what happened at Thanksgiving,
translation.ko: 추수감사절 사건을 추적하고 있는 거 알아

translation.en: I'm here because I need to confess.
Yes, you need to arrest me.
I poisoned everybody. I did it.
You intentionally poisoned a dozen people at Thanksgiving?
translation.ko: 추수감사절 때 의도적으로 십여 명에게 독을 먹였다고?

translation.en: What'd you use to poison them?
I used antifreeze. I put it in a pie that I brought to dinner.
Did Campbell put you up to this? Did he tell you to come here and confess?
translation.ko: 캠벨이 보낸 거야? 가서 자백하라고 시켰어?

translation.en: Because he's capable of something like this.
No. It was me. I did.
Why would you want to make everybody sick like that?
Whatever game you and Campbell are playing,
translation.ko: 너랑 캠벨이 무슨 수작을 벌이는지 몰라도

translation.en: -I just needed him to stop. -Stop what?
translation.ko: - 난 캠벨을 막고 싶었어 - 뭘 막아?

translation.en: 'Cause you know, if I was home...
[cries] If I was home, I'd just...
I'd just get on a bus or a train, and I'd go.
I'd just go away, but there's no way...
And I tried to get to it. I tried.
I tried to eat as much as I could. I didn't want to get anyone sick.
translation.ko: 다른 애들이 아프지 않게 내가 다 먹으려고 했어

translation.en: I didn't want to hurt anybody, just him.
translation.ko: 캠벨만 해치려고 했지 딴 애들은 아니야

translation.en: I just wanted to be dead.
But you need to protect me, please.
If you arrest him, he's just going to tell everybody what I've done.
translation.ko: 걔를 체포하면 내가 한 짓을 모두에게 말할 거야

translation.en: And what I've done is so much worse.
I'll try to figure it out.
But we can't tell anyone why you were arrested.
translation.ko: 하지만 네가 체포된 이유는 누구한테도 말할 수 없어

translation.en: You don't deserve to be punished for this.
translation.ko: 이 일로 네가 벌을 받아선 안 돼

translation.en: We don't want anyone to start asking why we're not having a trial.
translation.ko: 왜 재판을 안 하느냐는 말이 들리지 않게 할 거야

translation.en: [sniffles] I didn't know where else to go.
[clears throat] Just not feeling it, I guess.
don't feel good about most things right now.

translation.ko: - 너무 서두르는 거 아닐까 - 뭘 서둘러?

translation.en: I just... I feel like it's moving kinda quickly.
I mean, living together, getting married...
You don't want to get married?
I don't know, maybe I'm just confused right now.
translation.ko: 몰라, 당장 혼란스러워서 그럴 수도 있지

translation.en: Shit, I don't know, maybe I'm just unhappy.
-About what I said about you running? -No, I mean...
No, I'm just trying to figure things out for myself. Okay?
Like, about how I want to feel. Like, me.
translation.ko: 내가 원하는 게 뭔지 내 입장에서

translation.en: Luke, we love each other. We slept together.
translation.ko: 루크, 우린 서로 사랑하고 같이 자기도 했어

translation.en: -You don't get to just take that back. -I know!
translation.ko: - 그렇게 되돌릴 수는 없어 - 나도 알아!

translation.en: I don't know what you want from me. I'm telling you how I feel.
translation.ko: 네가 원하는 게 뭔지 모르겠어 내 느낌을 말하는 거야

translation.en: Like, can that be okay for--
I'm just trying to understand what this is about.
Yeah, and I'm telling you that I don't know.
translation.ko: 그래, 그런데 나는 모르겠다고 말하고 있잖아

translation.en: Maybe it's about all of it.
Just go to sleep. All right?
Just wanted to come by and check on Harry.
The candidate's in the shower, but you're welcome to wait.
You know, it's been awhile since I've seen you guys together.
translation.ko: 너희가 같이 있는 모습 본 지 오래됐어

translation.en: The friendship kind of petered out there.
What are you doing here, Campbell?
I could ask you the same question. I know you're on Allie's side.
translation.ko: 나도 묻고 싶은 질문이네 너 앨리 편이잖아

translation.en: To make sure that he's not being taken advantage of.
What are you gonna do if he wins?
We're gonna run this town the way it should be run.
Good God. That's, like, really fucking good.
Anyway, I'd say that you're welcome to join us on our endeavor, but...
seeing as we're being honest with each other,
I don't really trust you either.
Hey. You guys seen these texts?
It's crazy, it looks like they arrested your girlfriend, Campbell.
translation.ko: 어이가 없어 네 여친을 체포했나 봐

translation.en: -I wanna see Elle. -You don't want to do this, man.
translation.ko: - 엘 만나러 왔어 - 이러지 않는 게 좋아

translation.en: -Back the fuck up. -Fucking ape. I wanna see my girlfriend.
translation.ko: - 물러서 - 고릴라 새끼가 - 여친 만나야 해, 막지 마 - 그래? 할 말 다 했지?

translation.en: -Get out of the way. -Oh, yeah? I think you mentioned that.
translation.ko: - 여친 만나야 해, 막지 마 - 그래? 할 말 다 했지?

translation.en: You know what I was thinking? You should back the fuck up.
translation.ko: 이제 내 의견 말할까? 뒤로 꺼지라고

translation.en: Where is she? I want to see Elle.
-It's not gonna happen. -What are you charging her with?
Now you're just arresting people 'cause you feel like it?
translation.ko: 이제 너 꼴리는 대로 체포도 하는 거야?

translation.en: -If this is some kinda fucked up game-- -I don't play games.
translation.ko: - 무슨 장난인지 모르겠지만... - 난 장난 안 해

translation.en: You're not pretending like this is the White House?
After the election, this all goes away.
And I don't think we know how to thank you.
translation.ko: 어떻게 하면 감사의 마음이 전해질지 모르겠어

translation.en: for being so brave when we don't know what's out there.
translation.ko: 뭐가 있는지 모르는 곳으로 용감하게 나아가주다니

translation.en: We have to make this town sustainable for living,
translation.ko: 우린 이 동네에서 지속 가능한 삶을 일궈야 해

translation.en: and it's not just about finding land to farm,
translation.ko: 농사지을 땅을 찾는 데 그치지 않고

translation.en: it's about taking responsibility for ourselves.
And I know it's not enough, but thank you.
For giving us a little bit of hope.
I know it's hard on you.
But I need you to know
what happened between us was real.
And I need you to be safe out there.
I need you to come back.
Something for you to read at night.
Sorry about the notes. It was the only copy
I could find from English class.
translation.ko: 영어 교실에 이거 한 권 남았더라

translation.en: [Helena] And then with 30 minutes left, we'll open the debate up to questions.
Harry, you chose tails and won the coin toss,
translation.ko: 해리, 뒷면을 선택했고 동전 던지기에서 이겼으니까

translation.en: And thanks to Allie for stepping up after her sister died
translation.ko: 앨리한테도 고마워 언니가 죽은 후 이 자리를 맡아

translation.en: to do a very, very difficult job.
Five months ago, she was the only one that could've done it.
A lot of things now are very different from when we first got here.
translation.ko: 처음 이곳에 도착했을 때와 비교해 많은 게 달라졌어

translation.en: All of our freedom, our possessions,
our identities, all for the greater good.
translation.ko: 더 큰 선을 위해 개인의 정체성도 버렸어

translation.en: we needed to turn over every decision in our lives
to become the ants in the colony that we are right now.
And I say it's time to give back
For getting here, to this moment.
And I know it hasn't always been easy, but take a look around you,
translation.ko: 늘 순탄했던 건 아니지만 주위를 둘러봐

translation.en: Because all of us agreed to put this place first.
translation.ko: 모든 사람이 이곳을 최우선으로 생각했기 때문이야

translation.en: And we've had to forget everything we learned about what life owed us.
translation.ko: 인생이 우리를 얼마나 고단하게 만드는지는 잊어야만 했어

translation.en: think about what we owe each other.
translation.ko: 우리가 서로에게 받은 혜택을 생각해야 해

translation.en: The next six months are going to be tough.
What Harry's offering might sound appealing,
but now is not the time for selfishness.
translation.ko: 하지만 지금은 이기심을 채울 때가 아니야

translation.en: and what is yours is all of ours,
translation.ko: 너희 것은 곧 우리 모두의 것이야

translation.en: and that's how we're gonna get through this.
we're going to find our way back home.
I'm going to now put the first question randomly from--
[Lexie] I'd like to make my opening statement.
Right, yeah, but it's not finished.
You had to sign up by the end of the day.
He doesn't want to give you back what's yours,
And that's true for him and all the rich assholes who support him,
translation.ko: 해리나 돈 많은 추종자들에겐 말이 되는 얘기야

translation.en: and you know who you are.
You guys want back to your big houses and your cars and your money in the bank.
translation.ko: 너희는 넓은 집과 차와 은행 예금을 돌려받고 싶을 거야

translation.en: Like, as if that means anything. So...
You know what? If that's you,
The guy who wouldn't give you the time of day in high school,
translation.ko: 고등학교 때 너희한테 일말의 관심도 안 주던 애가

translation.en: he's not gonna look out for you now.
Like a dictator gets things done.
You know, here's a story you don't know.
After people got sick at Thanksgiving, Allie and her military police
translation.ko: 추수감사절에 중독 사건이 일어나자 앨리와 헌병대가

translation.en: in the dark, for four hours.
I got my period in the middle,
and they made me change in front of them.
I had to take off my clothes while they watched.

translation.ko: - 시간 종료 - 아직 얘기 안 끝났어

translation.en: I had to cover my menstrual blood so they couldn't see.
translation.ko: 내 생리혈을 안 보이게 숨겨야 했고

translation.en: I had to hide my breasts.
Imagine what else she and her secret police do
translation.ko: 앨리와 비밀경찰이 남들 안 보는 곳에서

translation.en: You don't get to ask questions now.
Oh, why? Because those are your rules? No, fuck that, Allie.
translation.ko: 왜? 네가 정한 규정이라? 집어치워, 엘

translation.en: Did you arrest Elle? Yes or no?
Come on, it's a simple question.
She tortures people in rooms where no one can see.
No, you decide where we sleep, what we eat, what job we have,
translation.ko: 넌 우리가 어디서 자고 무얼 먹고 무슨 일을 하고

translation.en: how late we can be on the streets.
You punish us, Allie. You punish us.
translation.ko: 넌 우리를 벌하고 있어 형벌을 내리지

translation.en: And you decide the punishment and there is no appeal.
translation.ko: 네 멋대로 정한 형벌에 우린 항소도 못 해

translation.en: Can we get back to the debate?
I need to be able to answer this!
[Lexie] All that power in five months.
Just imagine who she'll be in two years if we elect her now.
translation.ko: 지금 앨리가 뽑히면 2년 후엔 어떻게 될까?

translation.en: What will you do differently, Lexie?
I mean, it was just a quick poll.
Maybe about 50 people as they were walking out.
Looks like Lexie might actually win this thing.
You should have talked to me.
I didn't think I needed your permission to make decisions.
translation.ko: 내 결정에 네 허락은 필요 없을 텐데

translation.en: Yeah, well, you could've used some help with this one.
translation.ko: 이런 일은 도움을 받는 편이 나았겠지

translation.en: It just blew up in your face.
Everything's at risk now. Everything we've worked for.
translation.ko: 우리가 노력한 게 전부 수포로 돌아가게 생겼어

translation.en: Lexie has no idea what she's doing.
Nobody even knows what she stands for.
translation.ko: 걔가 뭘 추구하는지 아는 사람조차 없어

translation.en: Elle asked me for help. She needed my protection.
What else was I supposed to do?
It's not all you're here for, right?
Now you're angry because I have feelings for you?
You know, it's like Lexie said. Maybe, uh...
you don't get to decide everything for everyone.
translation.ko: 네가 모든 사람의 일을 결정할 수는 없다고

translation.en: That's not what I need from you right now.
I'm not a machine, Allie. I can't turn it on and off.
translation.ko: 난 껐다 켜는 기계가 아니야, 앨리

translation.en: You want to wait, I can respect that, but...
translation.ko: 네가 시간이 필요하다면 이해할 수 있지만...

translation.en: I don't know what I want.
and you did a really good job stepping up.
translation.ko: 넌 그 자리에서 놀라운 활약을 펼쳤어

translation.en: You don't get to make all the rules, not for me.
translation.ko: 내 모든 일들을 네가 결정할 수는 없어

translation.en: There are some things you're not in control of.
translation.ko: 세상엔 네가 좌우할 수 없는 게 있어

translation.en: [audiobook narrator] And somehow, the mountains will never sound right to us.
We'll give them new names, but the old names are there,
translation.ko: '우리가 새 이름을 붙여도 옛 이름이 존재한다'

translation.en: and the mountains were shaped and seen under those names.
translation.ko: '산은 그 이름 아래서 모양을 갖추고 눈에 비춰졌다'

translation.en: No matter how we touch Mars...
And then we'll get mad at it.
And you know what we'll do.
Only thing I have on my phone is the fucking Martian Chronicles.
I used to not be able to understand it, but now I think I'm starting to get it.
translation.ko: 예전에는 이해가 안 갔는데 이제 슬슬 알겠어

translation.en: You've got, like, a million photos.
Let's look at pictures of who we were.
[Kelly] Are you wearing a crop top?
I can maybe wear that top as a hat now.
I don't think he's just a bus driver.
